price: 67. Tada galiausiai jiems bus duotas verdantis vanduo gerti, kad tai susimaišytų (verdantis vanduo ir zakum jų pilvuose).
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمۡ عَلَيۡهَا لَشَوۡبٗا مِّنۡ حَمِيمٖ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: thumma inna lahum ʿalayhā lashawban min ḥamīmin
